evidence.claim: ChoiceCare adheres to HIPAA guidelines for managing patient data securely.
They utilize EDI X12 for electronic healthcare transactions.
The company has integration capabilities for EHR systems utilizing HL7 standards.
Compliance with healthcare regulations is emphasized on their security page.
They provide FHIR API support for health data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction engagement or clearinghouse use on the site.
